sentences.english: The report highlights the impact small arms and light-weapons have on three fragile societies.
sentences.chinese: 這份報告強調了小武器和輕武器對三個國家的影響。

sentences.english: The country is also awash with small arms.
For point defense, the Mercury class mounts similar light weaponry to older Battlestar classes.
sentences.chinese: 點防禦，汞級安裝類似的輕武器向老年人太空堡壘班。

sentences.english: With the patter of small arms, the warnings-st of the rifles.
sentences.chinese: 輕武器喋喋不休，警示着步槍的超音雷。
